com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.layout
Class BoxLayout

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.event.BaseObservable
      com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.Layout
          com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.layout.BoxLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HBoxLayout, VBoxLayout
public abstract class BoxLayout
extends Layout

Base class for box layouts.

Pack config:

  • START - Children are packed together at top side of container.
  • CENTER - Children are packed together at mid-height of container.
  • Children are packed together at bottom side of container.
